Spring of a Twenty Year Old
2:

Text: Every End of the Day:  The single has a double A-side hit singles, "Peach" and "Every End of the Day" which was also released digitally, consists of three tracks in total, one of which was composed by IU.
Triplets:<IU
3:
--------------------
Text: Every End of the Day:  It is the singer's first Korean-language release since the full-length album, "Last Fantasy", that was released six months prior.
Triplets:<Every End of the Day
5:
--------------------
Text: Every End of the Day:  The latter topped "Billboard" Korea K-Pop Hot 100 for four consecutive weeks, making it IU's second number-one hit on the chart after "You and I".
Triplets:<The latter

Text: Every End of the Day:  The single has sold over 34,400 copies in South Korea as of 2013.
